title: Immutable Cloud Pipeline
description: High-availability AWS deployment using Terraform and GitHub Actions. Implements zero-trust security layers, automated failover strategies, and real-time monitoring.

title: K8s Mesh Orchestration
description: Enterprise-scale EKS cluster management with Istio service mesh. Features traffic shifting, mTLS encryption, and observability via Prometheus/Grafana.

title: Serverless Data Engine
description: Event-driven processing architecture handling millions of events daily via Lambda and SQS. Currently optimizing cold-start latency.

title: Azure Hybrid Network
description: Designing a secure VPN gateway solution connecting on-premise data centers to Azure Virtual Networks using BGP routing.
